data_table.description: Subject ID, consent group, and affection status of participants affected or not affected with familial lung cancer and involved in the "Genetic Epidemiology of Lung Cancer Consortium GWAS of Familial Lung Cancer" project.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects
